title: Ascent Health Limited, Metlife Bangladesh sign memo
body: Ascent Health Limited and Metlife Bangladesh have recently signed a memorandum of understanding in Dhaka. Under this partnership, Metlife Bangladesh card holders, along with their families and dependents, will now have access to Ascent Health’s reliable, technology-driven and extensive healthcare services, said a press release on Sunday. Ascent Health continues to strengthen its diagnostic capabilities with fully automated facilities, expert-driven accurate reports, convenient home sample collection and consultations from some of the country’s most renowned physicians. The MoU was signed by Anwarul Iqbal, CEO of Ascent Health Limited, and Ala Uddin, deputy managing director and CFO, Metlife Bangladesh. Present among others in the ceremony were Zubair Ahmed, executive director Ascent Group and Abu Hena Mostofa Belal, senior vice-president of Metlife Bangladesh
